plot: A man's love and tenderness, which he once shared with his wife, is slipping away. As one sexual existence ends, another is just beginning.
title: The Making of Parts
plot_es: A man's love and tenderness, which he once shared with his wife, is slipping away. As one sexual existence ends, another is just beginning.
plot_en: A man's love and tenderness, which he once shared with his wife, is slipping away. As one sexual existence ends, another is just beginning.
